Name: Advanced Dragon Spark
Desc: After using Evan's direct Attack skills, there's a chance for Mir to execute additional attacks.

Desc.Old: After using Evan's direct attack skills, there's a chance for Mir to execute additional enhanced attacks.
Desc.New: After using Evan's direct Attack skills, there's a chance for Mir to execute additional attacks.

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 100% chance of casting Dragon Spark with 150% damage.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 100% chance of Advanced Dragon Spark that attacks at 150% Damage

h1.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] Attacks create a 100% chance of casting Dragon Spark with 150% damage.
h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 100% chance of Advanced Dragon Spark that attacks at 150% Damage
